Sentencas: In this contribution, a reversible Solid Oxide Cell based on perovskites was developed.
Titulo: Reversible, all-perovskite SOFCs based on La, Sr gallates

Sentencas: La0.6Sr0.4Ga0.3Fe0.7O3 (LSGF) was chosen as electrode and deposited onto La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3 (LSGM) electrolyte.
Titulo: Reversible, all-perovskite SOFCs based on La, Sr gallates

Sentencas: The cell was investigated from the morphological (SEM) and compatibility (XRD) point of view.
Titulo: Reversible, all-perovskite SOFCs based on La, Sr gallates

Sentencas: Electrochemical investigation confirmed that the cell can operate in fuel cell and in electrolyser modes.
Titulo: Reversible, all-perovskite SOFCs based on La, Sr gallates

Sentencas: Impregnation with CGO and Pd allowed a 15 times increment of the power density (until limit is the cell architecture).
Titulo: Reversible, all-perovskite SOFCs based on La, Sr gallates

Sentencas: The same cell with an impregnated negative electrode was then tested in steam electrolysis mode in a non-reducing environment.
Titulo: Reversible, all-perovskite SOFCs based on La, Sr gallates

Sentencas: The overall performance is slightly lower than state-of-the-art materials and comparable with similar perovskites, and in general is fair considering the needed cell optimization (i.e an anode supported configuration is necessary).
Titulo: Reversible, all-perovskite SOFCs based on La, Sr gallates

Sentencas: The cell (impregnated and not) activates at 0.7 V. Obtained data suggest thus LSGF/LSGM/LSGF cell, is promising as reversible SOC for intermediate temperature.
Titulo: Reversible, all-perovskite SOFCs based on La, Sr gallates
